org.apache.bookkeeper.client

Class LedgerMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.bookkeeper.client.LedgerMetadata

  • public class LedgerMetadata
extends Object
    This class encapsulates all the ledger metadata that is persistently stored in zookeeper. It provides parsing and serialization methods of such metadata.

      • getEnsembles

        public SortedMap<Long,ArrayList<InetSocketAddress>> getEnsembles()
        Get the Map of bookie ensembles for the various ledger fragments that make up the ledger.
        Returns:
        SortedMap of Ledger Fragments and the corresponding bookie ensembles that store the entries.
